Modification_Detail.description: Updates to title and name to support EdWG scrub efforts
Major changes per PDS Editorial Working Group efforts.

Internal_Reference.comment: Detailed documentation about this context product.

External_Reference.reference_text: NASA, Apollo 11 Preliminary Science Report, NASA SP-214, published by NASA, Washington D.C., 204, 1969.
External_Reference.description: Report detailing the scientific experiments performed on the surface of the Moon, crew observations, and preliminary examinations of lunar samples for the Apollo 11 mission.

External_Reference.reference_text: NASA, Apollo Scientific Experiments Data Handbook, NASA Technical Memorandum X-58131, JSC-09166, published by NASA Johnson Space Center, Houston, Texas, Aug. 1974.
External_Reference.description: Handbook that provides descriptions of the scientific experiments (both surface-based and orbital), operational history, and details about the formats and availability of the datasets from the Apollo Program.

External_Reference.reference_text: Bates, J.R., W.W. Lauderdale, and H. Kernaghan, ALSEP termination report, NASA Reference Publication Series, NASA-RP-1036, published by NASA, Washington, D.C., 162, 1979.
External_Reference.description: Summary of the Apollo Lunar Surface Experiments Package (ALSEP) operations and activities.

External_Reference.reference_text: NASA, Apollo 11 Mission Page, 11 Jul. 2024. https://www.nasa.gov/mission/apollo-11

Investigation.name: Apollo 11
Investigation.description: NASA's Apollo 11 mission was the first crewed lunar landing and moonwalk. While on the lunar surface, astronauts measured moonquakes, collected a sample of solar wind, deployed a laser retroreflector, collected lunar samples, and performed ceremonial duties.
